rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Great teacher. Very clear and organized when teaching. Assignments are fair and they're good at assuring that you learn the language and not just memorize it. A lot of interaction throughout class. Oral exams are required. Exams are very easy.

Awesome teacher! She made Portuguese the easiest language to learn. Quizzes and tests are super easy. Class is laid back and relaxing. If you're looking to take an easy foreign language, this is the class for you. Easy A.
